data.title: Lindenwood University Composite Events Schedule
data.meta_description: Your source for Lindenwood University campus events including a composite calendar filled with academic, student life, community events, and much more!
data.text:
Student Involvement facilitates a fall advisor training to communicate expectations and important responsibilities of student organization advisors. Since the semester starts very rapidly, we want to set aside some time…

Join your new peers on the stadium field for the biggest icebreaker activity you have ever been a part of! Playfair is a wonderful opportunity to start meeting new people and meeting your lifelong friends. Games and activities…

Bonfire, s'mores, glow-in-the-dark giveaways, and a bubble bus with glow-in-the-dark bubbles...what more could you ask for? Come out to the Pfremmer Lakeside Amphitheater on Wednesday, August 21 to take a load off and mingle with…

During New Student Orientation, First-Year students will be invited to a welcome rally where they will be introduced to a few people such as the President of the University and NSO Lion Leaders. Students will also get to meet…

Come learn about our fraternities and sororities at Lindenwood, benefits of membership, and meet our current members! As an added bonus, there will be a top your own donut station! Fraternities: Delta Tau Delta Phi Delta…

Join us for a special menu in the Evans Commons Dining Hall to get a taste of what Dining Services has to offer throughout the year! Local St. Louis favorites will also be featured, so if you're not from around here, be sure to…

Come unwind with us after your first few days of NSO on the Evans Commons Lawn. Local band Up All Night will be playing live music (don't worry, they play all the favorites!) and lawn games will be set up around the area. Students…

Join us for the biggest bash of the week at Hunter Stadium on Saturday night! Food, games, artists, giveaways, music...you name, we've got it. Make new memories with your new friends while you let loose after a long day of NSO…

Grab your pals and shake it off as we play a special Taylor Swift themed Bingo night! On August 27 at 6 p.m. join us for a fun filled night of Bingo, music, and prizes.

Join us for our Fall Blood Drive sponsored with the American Red Cross. Sign up to save a life today! To sign up to donate, click here. You can see available appointment times and reserve your slot today. All donors will…

Meet the members of fraternity and sorority life at Lindenwood in a kickback-style event with activities, new friends, and a snow cone food truck!

Join us for an exciting evening at the Lindenwood Football Watch Party! We’ll be watching the big game on a giant screen, surrounded by fellow fans and friends. Participate in fun games and activities during halftime for a…
